trans-unit.source: Represents a reference to a discovery document.
This class cannot be inherited.
XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available XML Web services given an URL.
The URL typically points to a discovery document, which usually has a.disco file name extension.

The discovery document contains references to information about the existance of XML Web services, such as Service Descriptions, XML Schema Definition language (XSD) schemas, or other discovery documents.
This class represents a reference to a discovery document.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the property to the value of href.
Reference to a discovery document.
The property is set to the value of href.
Gets the name of the default file to use when saving the referenced discovery document.
Name of the default file to use when saving the referenced document to a file.
Gets the contents of the referenced discovery document as a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> object.

If the discovery document has not been downloaded and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>, an attempt to download and resolve the document is made.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> representing the contents of the referenced discovery document.
<xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol"></xref> property is `null`.
-or-
An error occurred during the download or resolution of the XSD schema using <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol"></xref>.
Reads and returns the discovery document from the passed <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref>.
<xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> containing the discovery document.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> containing the contents of the referenced discovery document.
Gets or sets the reference to a discovery document.
For most references, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref%2A> property is a URL, such as http://www.contoso.com/MyWebService.disco.
Reference to a discovery document.
Verifies that all referenced documents within the discovery document are valid.

Unless you specifically need to resolve the individual references of a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> object, you should invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol>.

This method resolves all references to discovery documents, XSD schemas, and Service Descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A> and any references found in referring discovery documents.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol"></xref> property is `null`.
-or-
The discovery document could not be downloaded and verified successfully.
Gets or sets the URL of the referenced discovery document.
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref%2A> property.
The URL of the referenced discovery document.
Writes the passed <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> into the passed <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref>.
The to write into stream.
The <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> into which the serialized discovery document is written.
